works.description: i am the author of the book, "the chromatic bansuri". the book is only available as a hard copy either from my site, amazon.com, and a couple of other niche sites that i sell to. the sites listed below appear to be offering unauthorized downloads. i attempted to download the book from the sites. the links send you to third-party sites that all attempt to get you to pay (in different ways) before you can download anything. i stopped there. it's obviously a scam.
